title: Print, "Tiger's Dance (Tora-Odori), No. 48", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Tiger's Dance
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 48 / Tora-odori
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves in mottled light blue and violet tints; inner leaves light blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Tiger's Dance (Tora-Odori), No. 48", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-100.
